message.content:
{"id": "18335", "title": "Bug 18335 - Perspective contents lost when view is maximized",
 "description": "", 
 "OB": "When the view is maximized and the workbench is closed, the temporary layout is being persisted instead of the proper layout. As a result, the perspective contents are lost when the view is reopened.",
 "EB": "The workbench should save and restore the proper layout when a view is maximized and the workbench is closed. This will ensure that the perspective contents are not lost.",
 "SR": "1. Update the workbench code to correctly save and restore the layout when a view is maximized and the workbench is closed.\n2. Perform thorough testing to verify that the perspective contents are not lost when reopening the view after it has been maximized and the workbench has been closed."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18335', 'title': 'Bug 18335Perspective contents lost when view is maximized', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'This temporary layoutmust be getting persisted instead of the proper layout when the workbench isclosed. ', 'SR': ''}
